Package entities

Class Gear

  • java.lang.Object
    • items.Item
      • entities.unusedEntities.Gear
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Visor
    public abstract class Gear
extends Item
    the gear class: these are items than can be equipped, but cannot be used by the player as an ability. these are passive items that boosts your stats THIS CLASS IS NOT USED YET
